abstractText: This Nepalese black-paper manuscript, incomplete and dated 797 Nepāla Saṃvat (1677 CE), contains a Dhāraṇī Collection, consisting of the Prajñāpāramitāhṛdaya and a somewhat unusual Saptavāra compendium, as it lacks the Vasudhārā and only includes the Vajravidāraṇā, the Gaṇapatihṛdayā, the Uṣṇīṣavijayā, the Parṇaśavarī-Mahāmāyāpraśamanī, the Mārīcī and the Grahamātṛkā.
abstractShort: This Nepalese black-paper manuscript, incomplete and dated 797 Nepāla Saṃvat (1677 CE), contains a Dhāraṇī Collection, consisting
title: Dhāraṇī collection
